name: Lights ON! 3310
description:
Lights ON! 3310

A game created for the Nokia Jam #3!

The goal of the game is to switch on all the lights.

Controls: Arrow Keys to navigate in the menus and select the switches. SPACE to validate. X to go back in the menus or leave the game.

I tried to respect the Nokia 3310 constraints:

  • resolution of 84x48
  • 2 colors (actual screen colors)
  • 15 fps
  • monophonic sound
  • less than 12 inputs (I used 6 actually)

And also used the same home screen design (with battery and network status), as well as the same menu UI (with scroll bar on the right and negative selection)
